======================================
Documentation for state_population.csv
======================================
Data in this file is used along with other datasets in the LoadDefaultRoadDvmtValues.R script to calculate default values heavy truck vehicle miles traveled (VMT) per capita by state.

File Structure
--------------
Rows contain data by state and the District of Columbia and Puerto Rico.
Column names as follows:
State: State name
Abbreviation: Two-letter postal code for state
Total: Total state population
Rural: Population in rural (non-urbanized) areas of the state
Urban: Population in urban (urbanized) areas of the state

Source:
-------
U.S. Bureau of the Census, 2020 Census of Population
Washington, ORegon, and Idaho are the only state where the 2020 opoulation was changed. Urban/Rural split is unavailable and was estimated by WSDOT based on 2010 split.
